name: Inn Delivery
description: The Innkeeper needs someone to deliver a special ale to the Wizard in the magic shop.

objectives.description: Deliver the Special Ale to the Wizard

dialogue.offer: I have a special ale that the old wizard ordered, but I can't leave the inn. Could you deliver it for me?
dialogue.accept: Wonderful! Here's the special ale. Take it to the wizard in the magic shop. Be careful not to spill it!
dialogue.decline: No worries, I'll find someone else to help.
dialogue.progress: Have you delivered the ale to the wizard yet? He's waiting for it.
dialogue.complete: Thank you so much! The wizard was pleased, I'm sure. Here's your payment.
dialogue.completed: Thanks again for helping with that delivery. The wizard is a good customer.
